titles.title: Rail Grade Crossing Safety Enhancement Act of 1994
To amend title 23, United States Code, to provide for the use of certain highway funds for improvements to railway-highway crossings.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1598)

bill.summary: 7/28/1994--Introduced. Rail Grade Crossing Safety Enhancement Act of 1994 - Permits the Secretary of Transportation, in lieu of reallocating certain funds from States without motorcycle helmet and safety belt use laws to highway safety programs, to transfer such funds to programs for railway-highway crossing improvements for such States. Conditions such authority on the request of the chief executive of the State concerned.
